name: flutter-log-fold
description: Foldable, filterable log viewer for Flutter debug sessions (Talker, pretty_dio_logger and custom block formats)

flutterLogFold.autoOpen.description: Automatically open the log panel when a debug session starts.

flutterLogFold.collapseByDefault.description: Collapse new log blocks by default.

flutterLogFold.maxLogs.description: Maximum number of log entries kept in the panel and buffer (oldest are removed).

flutterLogFold.maxBlockLines.description: Maximum number of lines in a single log block before it is force-emitted. Increase if large HTTP responses (e.g. long JSON payloads) are split across multiple entries.

enumDescriptions: Use custom blockStart / blockEnd / blockContentPrefix values
flutterLogFold.preset.description: Block pattern preset. Selecting a preset overrides blockStart, blockEnd and blockContentPrefix.

flutterLogFold.blockStart.description: Block start marker (substring match). Only used when preset is 'custom'.

flutterLogFold.blockEnd.description: Block end marker (substring match). Only used when preset is 'custom'.

flutterLogFold.blockContentPrefix.description: Prefix stripped from lines inside a block. Only used when preset is 'custom'. Empty string = no stripping.

flutterLogFold.talkerBlocFormat.description: Format Talker bloc plugin blocks (bloc-transition, bloc-create, bloc-close) into concise one-line summaries.

flutterLogFold.talkerStripTimestamp.description: Strip Talker's '| HH:MM:SS xxxms |' timestamp from block summaries (fallback for tags without a specific formatter).

flutterLogFold.talkerRouteFormat.description: Format Talker route observer blocks into concise one-line summaries.

flutterLogFold.lineStripPattern.description: Optional regex applied to every line before block detection. Use to strip process prefixes, e.g. ^[A-Z]/[\w.]+\(\d+\):\s? removes 'I/flutter (PID): '. Empty = disabled.
